LanguageData.kathanon.IVFEquality.InseminationDesc: Choose a woman to be inseminated with this sperm sample for a chance at pregnancy. The biological parents of the resulting child will be the inseminated woman and man who provided the sperm sample.
LanguageData.kathanon.IVFEquality.InseminationChanceC: The success chance for inseminating {0} with {1} is {2}.\n\nThe success chance is dependent on the fertility of the biological parents. It will be lower if the either is too old or too young.
LanguageData.kathanon.IVFEquality.InseminationBothCon:
The success chance for inseminating {0} with {1} is {2}.

The success chance is dependent on the fertility of the biological parents. It will be lower if the either is too old or too young.

{3} is {0}'s {4}. If the insemination succeeds, there's a {5} chance that the resulting baby will have genetic abnormalities due to inbreeding.

Are you sure you want to continue?
LanguageData.kathanon.IVFEquality.FertilizeDesc: Choose an ovum to be fertilized with this sperm sample, to create an embryo. The embryo can then be implanted in a mother to start a pregnancy, or in a growth vat. The biological parents of the resulting child will be the woman who provided the ovum and the man who provided the sperm sample.
LanguageData.kathanon.IVFEquality.FertilizeWithDesc: Choose a sperm sample to fertilize this ovum with, to create an embryo. The embryo can then be implanted in a mother to start a pregnancy, or in a growth vat. The biological parents of the resulting child will be the woman who provided the ovum and the man who provided the sperm sample.
LanguageData.kathanon.IVFEquality.NoTargets: No women that can be inseminated by this sample.
